home.title: Protect your vehicle with our reliable insurance!
home.description: Our company offers the best conditions for insuring your car. Affordable prices, fast processing, and maximum coverage.

rca.title: OSAGO (RCA)
rca.description: Get an RCA OSAGO policy directly on our website. We offer affordable prices and a convenient service.
rca.longDescription: OSAGO, or Compulsory Civil Liability Insurance, is a reliable form of protection when driving a car in Moldova. This insurance protects individuals affected in an accident caused by another party. In case of an incident, it helps cover medical expenses, car repairs, and other damages. OSAGO is a mandatory requirement for all drivers. Before operating a vehicle, make sure your policy is active. Failure to comply with this requirement may result in significant fines. When choosing an insurance company, it is important to evaluate not only the price of the policy. Key factors include the company's reputation, quality of service, and speed of payments. Choosing the right insurance company can prevent additional problems in the event of an accident and ensure that you and those affected receive the necessary support and compensation.

greencard.title: Green Card
greencard.description: Get a Green Card for traveling abroad. We offer a simple and fast application process.
greencard.longDescription: The "Green Card" is your safety net when you're traveling abroad. This policy is like your guardian angel, ensuring that if you have an accident outside Moldova, you'll be covered for any third-party damages. Just make sure your policy is active throughout your trip so you can avoid any fines or complications.

medical.title: Medical Insurance
medical.description: Invest in your health with comprehensive coverage.
medical.longDescription: Are you planning a trip abroad? We're here to help you find the travel insurance that's right for you. This policy can cover everything from medical expenses and injuries to lost luggage and documents. With the right insurance, you can leave your worries behind and focus on enjoying your trip. When choosing an insurance plan, it's important to pay attention to the coverage limits and the availability of important options, such as dental care, lost luggage, or trip cancellation. No matter what kind of trip you're planning, it's important to choose a plan that works for you. When picking an insurance company, it's okay to look beyond just the price. Take a look at the risks they cover, how they handle payments, and their reputation.
